message: just posted this on Hacker News this morning but it seems to have been pushed way down - I just private beta launched http://www.shelfluv.com and would love some feedback - use the invite code HN http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=2406441 - thanks!
interesting but can you share version of ebooks you have?
only runs as a facebook app with access to data and perms to post on wall... maybe a trial-ware version first that's a standalone webapp with oauth
we dont have sharing of ebooks. Lendle tried to do that and got shutdown by amazon. They don't like that. Oauth support down the line
